slide.title: Your first real slide
slide.blurb: In our presentation definition file we named our first slide "slides/foo/intro.xml", so create this file with your favourite text editor. Here is a simple example that just has a slide title and a blurb of text with a title.
Don't worry about indenting the tags if you don't feel like it. It is not required.
To see what this looks like, go to the next slide.
